protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the conversion of gamma-aminobutyrate and L-beta-aminoisobutyrate to succinate semialdehyde and methylmalonate semialdehyde, respectively. Can also convert delta-aminovalerate and beta-alanine.

go_class.description: cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
cellular amino acid derivative metabolic process
